name: Heal Field
description:
First game! Move around and heal people with mana. With each death you get more and more heartbroken. Heavy use of imagination during game strongly encouraged.

Sprites: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/board-game-icons

Sounds: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds

Upheaval font: https://www.dafont.com/aenigma.d188

Penguin font: https://www.dafont.com/jack-oatley.d6095
